contexts.context: ...could not have been viewed otherwise than with equal <mark>pain</mark> and distrust by a State, which regards such...
However <mark>painful</mark> it must be to His Majesty on any occasion...
His Majesty must either place Himself in this <mark>painful</mark> and inconsistent position for an independent Sovereign, or...
..., or he must do what would be equally <mark>painful</mark> to His feelings, require from His August Friend...
